name: es6-shim
description: ECMAScript 6 (Harmony) compatibility shims for legacy JavaScript engines

scripts.test: npm run lint && evalmd *.md && npm run tests-only
scripts.tests-only: npm run test-shim && npm run test-sham
scripts.test-native: npm run jshint-shim && NO_ES6_SHIM=1 mocha test/*.js test/*/*.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint-shim && npm run lint-sham
scripts.lint-shim: npm run jshint-shim && npm run jscs-shim && npm run eslint-shim
scripts.lint-sham: npm run jshint-sham && npm run jscs-sham && npm run eslint-sham
scripts.eslint: npm run eslint-shim && npm run eslint-sham
scripts.jshint: npm run jshint-shim && npm run jshint-sham
scripts.jscs: npm run jscs-shim && npm run jscs-sham
scripts.minify: npm run minify-shim && npm run minify-sham
